casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Dwayne LEWIS 141P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 17, 2018 Ms. Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellant Defender, FOR Lewis, Robert Dwayne Mr. Milind Kumar Dongre, Attorney at Law, for State of North Carolina Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General Mr. Thomas J. Campbell, Assistant Attorney General Mr. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for Lewis, Robert Dwayne Ms. Kathryn L. VandeBerg, Assistant Appellate Defender

Ms. Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of May 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of May 2018."
